#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int cases;
	long long int mod = 1000000007;
	long long int ans = 0;
	int n;
	scanf("%d", &cases);
	while(cases--) {
		scanf("%d", &n);
		if(n == 1) {
			printf("3\n");
			continue;
		}
		long long int dp[n+2][3][3];
		dp[0][0][0] = 0;
		dp[0][0][1] = 0;
		dp[0][0][2] = 0;
		dp[0][1][0] = 0;
		dp[0][1][1] = 0;
		dp[0][1][2] = 0;
		dp[0][2][0] = 0;
		dp[0][2][1] = 0;
		dp[0][2][2] = 0;
		
		dp[1][0][0] = 0;
		dp[1][0][1] = 0;
		dp[1][0][2] = 0;
		dp[1][1][0] = 0;
		dp[1][1][1] = 0;
		dp[1][1][2] = 0;
		dp[1][2][0] = 0;
		dp[1][2][1] = 0;
		dp[1][2][2] = 0;
		
		dp[2][0][0] = 1;
		dp[2][0][1] = 1;
		dp[2][0][2] = 1;
		dp[2][1][0] = 1;
		dp[2][1][1] = 1;
		dp[2][1][2] = 1;
		dp[2][2][0] = 1;
		dp[2][2][1] = 1;
		dp[2][2][2] = 1;
		
		for(int i = 3;i <= n;i++) {
			dp[i][0][0] = ((dp[i-1][0][0] + dp[i-1][1][0]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][0]) % mod;
			dp[i][0][1] = ((dp[i-1][0][0] + dp[i-1][1][0]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][0]) % mod;
			dp[i][0][2] = ((dp[i-1][0][0] + dp[i-1][1][0]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][0]) % mod;
			dp[i][1][0] = ((dp[i-1][0][1] + dp[i-1][1][1]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][1]) % mod;
			dp[i][1][1] = ((dp[i-1][0][1] + dp[i-1][1][1]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][1]) % mod;
			dp[i][1][2] = ((dp[i-1][1][1]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][1]) % mod;
			dp[i][2][0] = ((dp[i-1][0][2] + dp[i-1][1][2]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][2]) % mod;
			dp[i][2][1] = ((dp[i-1][0][2] + dp[i-1][1][2]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][2]) % mod;
			dp[i][2][2] = ((dp[i-1][0][2] + dp[i-1][1][2]) % mod + dp[i-1][2][2]) % mod;
		}
		long long int sum = 0;
		for(int i = 0;i < 3;i++) {
			for(int j = 0;j < 3;j++) {
				sum += dp[n][i][j];
				sum = sum % mod;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n", sum);
	}
}
